thread.title: ‘Ambitious’ Apple Store Put Up For Sale by Chicago Landlord

author: WSJ Real Estate
title: ‘Ambitious’ Apple Store Put Up For Sale by Chicago Landlord

organizations.name: chelsea market seeks to replicate success in other cities google

text:
COMMERCIAL REAL ESTATE ‘Ambitious’ Apple Store Put Up For Sale by Chicago Landlord The Chicago landlord of what Apple Inc. calls its “most ambitious store” has put the building on the block in a sales process that will test the power of the popular brand name in a tempestuous retail climate.
U.S. Existing Home Sales Rose Robustly in February New York’s Chelsea Market Seeks to Replicate Success in Other Cities
Google closed on its record $2.4 billion purchase of the Chelsea Market building in Manhattan on Tuesday,...
